servinfo.title: Rear End Door Glass Removal and Installation
servinfo.ptxt: Refer to Windshield Removal and Installation as removal and installation procedures are basically the same. However, note the following.

item.ptxt: Observe the following precautions when applying adhesive (1) along glass (2) edge.
Adhesive (1) should be applied evenly especially in height.
Be careful not to damage primer (3).
With the position of fastener (4) properly aligned, install glass (2) on rear end door panel (5).
Press glass against body quickly after adhesive (1) is applied.

spec.title: Adhesive amount specifications and position for rear end door glass
spec.ptxt: Position “d”: 15 mm (0.59 in.) for glass upper and bottom section
